source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a dimly lit, narrow hallway. A single closed door stands at the end, bathed in the eerie glow of a red light fixture mounted above it. A sign on the wall, also under the red light, displays the text "13 号房间".
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: Please remove the word "static" from the caption.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: Please remove the word "static" from the caption.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a scenery shot of a dimly lit, narrow hallway. A single closed door stands at the end, bathed in the eerie glow of a red light fixture mounted above it. A sign on the wall, also under the red light, displays the text "13 号房间".
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a dimly lit, narrow hallway. A single closed door stands at the end, bathed in the eerie glow of a red light fixture mounted above it. A sign on the wall, also under the red light, displays the text "13 号房间".

bad_caption: A person slowly walks down a brightly lit staircase, pausing briefly to look out a large window at the landing before continuing to descend. At the bottom, they open a glass door and step outside into a sunlit courtyard.
